reviews.text: Bottle 0,75ltr: Dark brown coloured brew with an red glow, good dried fruits, caramel and spices taste, and some warm feeling in the mouth.
Typical weissbier aroma of wheat, banana and yeast. Spicy taste, quite yeasty, some wheat and banana. Cloudy golden color, thick white head. Just another german hefeweizen.
